BREAKING: The RDR-7000 Weather radar is now FAA certified
Honeywell’s IntuVue RDR-7000 Weather Radar System gives business aviation and helicopter pilots the clear and timely information they need to make safer, faster and more informed decisions before flying in bad weather and challenging environments. The radar is now certified for Falcon 900EX, Citation X and Global Express platforms.
Learn more about the RDR-7000 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/weather-radar/rdr-7000?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_bganewsletter&utm_content=aprbganewsletter]]>. Help Us Throttle Up the Customer Experience
Honeywell is committed to continuously improving our customer experience. We work to deliver the highest level of satisfaction for customers everyday, resolving inquiries with first contact and closing cases rapidly. Our aim is to be at the top of industry surveys, and we make improvements directly based on survey feedback. It’s time for the 2021 AIN survey and we want to hear from you.
CLICK HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/when-you-fly-we-fly?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_bganewsletter&utm_content=aprbganewsletter]]> Mark Wahlberg Says Goodbye to Downtime
Between his philanthropic endeavors and business commitments – and his favorite role as father to four kids ages 10-17 – downtime is rare for Mark Wahlberg. Downtime also is rare for Mark’s Global Express, thanks to Honeywell and channel partner Standard Aero, which handled the November 2020 upgrade at its Springfield, Illinois, maintenance, repair and overhaul center.
